item.title: Paradise-Reborn | 317/474 | Economy based/Pk based Mixed | PvP system/Shop |More
item.dc:creator: @evanownz evanownz
item.description:
@evanownz wrote:

Team_Rocket:

It isn’t a 474. I don’t see any difference between this and all of the other servers exactly like it.

I wouldn’t consider it a full 474 server hence why I said “317/474” in the title, I have the cache loading 474 items.
